Left 4 Dead 1 é parecido com o 2 só que foi lançado antes (AVÁÁÁ é mesmo?!) e tem uma atmosfera mais sombria, com gráficos mais escuros e músicas de terror (prova disso é o próprio menu principal)... vale a pena pela experiência nova e por ter conquistas diferentes do segundo... e embora o dois tenha todas as campanhas do um, o maior ponto positivo de todos é que no um não tem aquela criatura insuportável do Jockey nem o chatonildo do charger, e isso pra mim foi um alívio indescritível.

My favorite co-op shooter of all time and easily one of the best still today. Left 4 Dead was such a huge part of the 7th. generation of consoles (and PC's)  influencing many titles to come thereafter as they tried to emulate and recreate the frenzied, chaotic, and fun nature of the orignal L4D but most fall short. Never has a game pushed me to my limits in terms of teamwork and organization, especially on Expert difficulty. Years later I find myself coming back to this and its sequel and I still receive the same level of challenge and overall fun I did on day one. This is without a doubt one of Valve's best multiplayer games. If you somehow haven't played Left 4 Dead- you need to get on that shit immediately and pray you don't aggro a witch.

I "accidentally" bought this game when I bought Left 4 Dead bundle. I expected more missions. I'm kinda disappointed how all missions (except the lighthouse survival) has already been ported to L4D2. Not many people play this game anymore, which means the online play function is dead. Unlike L4D2, this game has no melee weapon, only pistols. But, this game has more challenging achievements and achievements for finishing a mission. The minigun is also easier to use, in L4D2 it turns red instantly and it's hard to predict when it overheats. Another unique thing is that when you look down, you can actually see your character's legs, unlike other Valve games.

I Originally played this on XBOX 360, so i cant speak for PC version, but this game is best played with people.
Its always best to play with a freind on like a teamspeak server or chatting, and just have fun, play the mini-games at the carnival, or just kill 5 Tanks at once (trust me, been there.... yeah nope, wasnt pritty). but its always a good multiplayer game, one of my personal favorites!

Though it is a good game, it gets boreing easly if you are running all bots, just endless mowing down with machine guns and beating the tar out of Tanks and Smokers (were they in L4D, or L4D2?)

Gioco intensissimo, non adatto a tutti perché iperfrenetico. E' un'apocalisse zombie assurda. Avete presente la serie televisiva di The Walking Dead? 1000 volte peggio, più zombi più cattivi e come se non bastasse altre aberrazioni... Lo raccomanderei solo a chi è appassionato di sparattutto e  sa giocare in cooperazione altrimenti è solo un suicidio. Grafica discreta, se avete un pc con una buona scheda grafica giocate al 2 però, ha le stesse campagne più altre nuove oltre a nuovi nemici e nuove sfide.
Игра хоть и старая,но хороший геймплей.Это все что я могу сказать.

This game is wondefull!! It has the horror ambiance with drama. What I really like about this game is how serious and dramatic the situation is. This is not the classic game like: you are the good person, the others are the bad guys and you have to kill them. There are common workers, employees of all areas, officinists, polices, doctors and other people that are infected and there is no way to cure them. And unfortunate, they must die. You have to kill normal people like you. Very dark and intense the feeling of this game. It deserves a 10

Great work!

Данная игра рассказывает историю о четырех выживших, после заражения зомби вирусом всего мира. Вам предстоит пройти целые города и районы, забитые рядами опасных и ненасытных зомби, которые готовы порвать вас на куски. Помимо зомби вам предстоит наткнуться на сверх-зомби, у каждого из которых есть свои способности. В игре очень много достижений, можно играть в сражение, где вы можете выбрать быть ли вам за зомби или за людей. Уровень эксперт в данной игре не заставит заскучать опытных стрелков по головам. Игра  очень увлекательная и я ее рекомендую пройти.

What do I love more than watching zombie movies with my wife is killing zombies in Left4Dead!  It has great game play, graphics, challenging difficulties, and you can play it online with the world!  The campaigne has an interesting story and for the fact that people can make their our mods and campaignes is purely epic!  One things that I do love is the routes in the game change all the time meaning it’s the same campaigne but there are different paths.  I would suggest starting out the campaignes out on Easy and start increasing the difficulty from there just so you can get the machanics down, and hopefully, and I saw this with a grain of salt; MAYBE players online with extend you the same courtesy.  Another thing I did like about the game is the achievements that reference other zombie movies and games.  Another thing to mention about the online game play is the huge co-op roster; I am talking about co-op 8, 16, 20, 26, and even up to 32 players at the same time and I am saying CAMPAIGNE not Versus mode!
Buen juego, estable y entretenido. 100% recomendado.

Even though left 4 dead 2 is a direct upgrade from this I still believe this one still has value to it.  This left 4 dead is missing features and maps but I still like this one more (atleast for its coop, not versus).  Id say get left 4 dead 2 if you're short on money but if you have some extra get the first one too.  The first one has no overpowered melee weapons, crowd clearing grenade launchers, or bilebombs that can divert them away.  It is also much darker compared to left 4 dead 2 and can be kinda scary to new players.  Many features in left 4 dead 2 seem to be built around versus, it makes sense because this was the first ones weakest aspect.  But the problem is it makes coop in the second one a living hell with zombies that spit acid on campers, or jockeys that ride away from teammates, and chargers that can kill you instantly.

Sadly most modders have left the first one because it does not have workshop support and most people play left 4 dead 2.  With no workshop or much of a community not many still play this one.  Granted you can still find a couple servers up during the day, it still is not that much.  

imo you should probably get left 4 dead 2 if you dont care much about what they changed and just wanna play, but you should give the first one a try at some point because it is (and still is) a very well made game.  (Very fun with a group of friends btw)
